lead_paragraph: Scott Sinclair marked his debut with a late winner to ensure Celtic got their title defence off to a winning start under new coach Brendan Rodgers with a 2-1 home victory over Hearts in the Scottish Premier League on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Sinclair Scores Debut Winner as Rodgers’ Celtic Beat Hearts
headline.main: Sinclair Scores Debut Winner as Rodgers’ Celtic Beat Hearts

snippet: Scott Sinclair marked his debut with a late winner to ensure Celtic got their title defence off to a winning start under new coach Brendan Rodgers with a 2-1 home victory over Hearts in the Scottish Premier League on Sunday....
